about.title: About Us | Chargefy
about.description: Chargefy phone accessories store. Our goal is to be useful to our customers, providing quality products along with convenient service. We help you find the best quality accessories for your phone quickly and conveniently.
about.mainBlock.description: We are a new store. Our goal is to be useful to our customers, to provide quality products along with convenient service. We provide a guarantee because we believe that online shopping should be as safe as possible. We help find the highest quality accessories for your phone quickly and conveniently.

delivery.mainBlock.title: Delivery
delivery.mainBlock.description: We deliver via the Nova Poshta postal service. Payment by cash on delivery is a priority for us, because this way you can personally verify the quality of the product before paying for it, but it is also possible to pay by card if you wish. We will also be happy to send by another delivery service that you specify.

return.mainBlock.description: The return section is currently under development, but you can return the product by contacting us at the contact numbers. Our managers will always be happy to help you.
